<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Description: This pass finds Load Value Injection (LVI) gadgets consisting</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// of a load from memory (i.e., SOURCE), and any operation that may transmit</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the value loaded from memory over a covert channel, or use the value loaded</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// from memory to determine a branch/call target (i.e., SINK). After finding</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all such gadgets in a given function, the pass minimally inserts LFENCE</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// instructions in such a manner that the following property is satisfied: for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// all SOURCE+SINK pairs, all paths in the CFG from SOURCE to SINK contain at</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// least one LFENCE instruction. The algorithm that implements this minimal</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// insertion is influenced by an academic paper that minimally inserts memory</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="comment">/// fences for high-performance concurrent programs:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="comment">///         http://www.cs.ucr.edu/~lesani/companion/oopsla15/OOPSLA15.pdf</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The algorithm implemented in this pass is as follows:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1 Build a condensed CFG (i.e., a GadgetGraph) consisting only of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="comment">/// following components:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="comment">///    - SOURCE instructions (also includes function arguments)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="comment">///    - SINK instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="comment">///    - Basic block entry points</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="comment">///    - Basic block terminators</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="comment">///    - LFENCE instructions</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 2 Analyze the GadgetGraph to determine which SOURCE+SINK pairs (i.e.,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="comment">/// gadgets) are already mitigated by existing LFENCEs. If all gadgets have been</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="comment">/// mitigated, go to step 6</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 3 Use a heuristic or plugin to approximate minimal LFENCE insertion.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 4 Insert one LFENCE along each CFG edge that was cut in step 3</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 5 Go to step 2</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 6 If any LFENCEs were inserted, return &#96;true&#96; from runOnMachineFunction()</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="comment">/// to tell LLVM that the function was modified.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/immutablegraph-h">ImmutableGraph.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="preprocessor">#include &quot;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/x86/x86-h">X86.h</a>&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105" lineLink="#a907f03ad7e6d730f51bcb31f761930bd"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/sys/dynamiclibrary">llvm::sys::DynamicLibrary</a> <a href="#a907f03ad7e6d730f51bcb31f761930bd">OptimizeDL</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="#a06f818ee2e01166c35a3bd261162db05"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int (&#42;<a href="#a06f818ee2e01166c35a3bd261162db05">OptimizeCutT</a>)(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;Nodes, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodesSize,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The &#96;Transmitters&#96; map memoizes transmitters found for each def. If a def</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has not yet been analyzed, then it will not appear in the map. If a def</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// has been analyzed and was determined not to have any transmitters, then</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// its list of transmitters will be empty.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find and eliminate gadget edges that have been mitigated.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemainingGadgets = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> ReachableNodes&#123;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> &amp;RootN : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ad96b7cf3182ce2ba85e5a7a93b12c441">G</a>.nodes()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// skip this node if it isn&#39;t a gadget source</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &amp;&amp; !ElimEdges.contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Any gadget whose sink is unreachable has been mitigated</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : RootN.edges()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#a72d45b3ad4bd84e88d5792e119e858e0">MachineGadgetGraph::isGadgetEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">X86LoadValueInjectionLoadHardeningPass::trimMitigatedEdges(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset">NodeSet</a> ElimNodes&#123;&#42;Graph&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">  EdgeSet ElimEdges&#123;&#42;Graph&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RemainingGadgets =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">      elimMitigatedEdgesAndNodes(&#42;Graph, ElimEdges, ElimNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ElimEdges.empty() &amp;&amp; ElimNodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/nodeset/#ae8ae83c6b97940d6cdcaeb6d1cd088fb">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal">    Graph-&gt;NumFences = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    Graph-&gt;NumGadgets = RemainingGadgets;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">                               RemainingGadgets);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> X86LoadValueInjectionLoadHardeningPass::hardenLoadsWithHeuristic(</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// If &#96;MF&#96; does not have any fences, then no gadgets would have been</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mitigated at this point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Graph-&gt;NumFences &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Eliminating mitigated paths...\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">    Graph = trimMitigatedEdges(std::move(Graph));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Eliminating mitigated paths... <Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Graph-&gt;NumGadgets == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cutting edges...\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">  EdgeSet CutEdges&#123;&#42;Graph&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Begin by collecting all ingress CFG edges for each node</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap&lt;const Node &#42;, SmallVector&lt;const Edge &#42;, 2&gt;</a>&gt; IngressEdgeMap;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : Graph-&gt;edges())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">      IngressEdgeMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.getDest()&#93;.push&#95;back(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// For each gadget edge, make cuts that guarantee the gadget will be</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// mitigated. A computationally efficient way to achieve this is to either:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (a) cut all egress CFG edges from the gadget source, or</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (b) cut all ingress CFG edges to the gadget sink.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Moreover, the algorithm tries not to make a cut into a loop by preferring</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// to make a (b)-type cut if the gadget source resides at a greater loop depth</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// than the gadget sink, or an (a)-type cut otherwise.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a> : Graph-&gt;nodes()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a> : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.edges()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#a72d45b3ad4bd84e88d5792e119e858e0">MachineGadgetGraph::isGadgetEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvector">SmallVector&lt;const Edge &#42;, 2&gt;</a> &amp;IngressEdges = IngressEdgeMap&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>.getDest()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &amp;EgressEdge : <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/regcomp-c/#a0240ac851181b84ac374872dc5434ee4">N</a>.edges())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(EgressEdge))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">          EgressEdges.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatebase/#af42bfbc067df27c19ee2fc859df58799">push&#95;back</a>(&amp;EgressEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EgressCutCost = 0, IngressCutCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &#42;EgressEdge : EgressEdges)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge &#42;IngressEdge : IngressEdges)</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal">          IngressCutCost &lt; EgressCutCost ? IngressEdges : EgressEdges;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CutEdges.contains(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-x86loadvalueinjectionloadhardening-cpp-/machinegadgetgraph/#adcd1c9400c9fb71f6417dfaefb71c6c6">MachineGadgetGraph::isCFGEdge</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#abb2b3a60ccc38a28239e19a1646e0c8a">E</a>))</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#123; </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// insert the LFENCE after the instruction</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/arm/armslshardening-cpp/#a5958512eae2979bd2eb383977996a600">MBB</a> = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>-&gt;getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
